pages.text: $(l)CHANGES IN HELL MODE - ALPHEM: $(br)$()+ Enhanced armor, attack damage, and health. $(br)$()+ They now spawn with stronger weapons, like a diamond sword or an iron axe. $(br)$()+ There is now a little chance for them to spawn with a totem of undying in it's off-hand.$(br)$()+ Windblaze projectiles now also deal 3 damage.
